TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TcpChannel extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiver, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSender, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ISecurableChannel
Public Class TcpChannel Implements IChannel, IChannelReceiver, IChannelSender, ISecurableChannel
type TcpChannel = class interface IChannelReceiver interface IChannel interface IChannelSender interface ISecurableChannel

summary.span: 提供使用 TCP 协议传输消息的信道实现。

span.span: Provides a channel implementation that uses the TCP protocol to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 信道跨越远程处理边界 （例如，应用程序域的计算机） 之间传输消息。Channels transport messages across remoting boundaries (for example, between computers on application domains). 类是一个方便的类组合的功能类和类。The class is a convenience class combining the functionality of the class and the class. .NET Framework 远程处理基础结构使用的通道来传输远程调用。Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 当客户端发出对远程对象的调用时，调用将被序列化为一条消息是由客户端通道发送和接收的服务器信道。When a client makes a call to a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 然后，它是反序列化和处理。It is then deserialized and processed. 任何返回的值是由服务器信道传输和接收客户端通道。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 若要执行其他处理的消息，您可以指定的实现并通过其处理的所有消息都可通过传递。To perform additional processing of messages, you can specify implementations of the and through which all messages processed by the are passed. 一个对象具有关联的配置属性，可以在设置配置文件中运行时 (通过调用静态方法) 或以编程方式 (通过传递集合构造函数）。A object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static method) or programmatically (by passing a collection to the constructor). 有关通道配置属性的详细信息，请参阅[通道和格式化程序配置属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe). > [!NOTE] > 如果服务器计算机运行 Windows 95/98/Me，则服务器不能被指定为安全。If the server computer is running Windows 95/98/Me, the server cannot be specified as secure. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用设置远程处理服务器和其客户端。The following code example shows how to use a to set up a remoting server and its client. 此示例包含三个部分、 一个服务器、 客户端，并且在服务器和客户端使用的远程对象。The example contains three parts, a server, a client, and a remote object used by the server and the client. 下面的代码示例显示了一台服务器：The following code example shows a server: [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CPP/server.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CS/server.cs#1)] 下面的代码示例显示了此服务器的客户端：The following code example shows a client for this server: [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CPP/client.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CS/client.cs#10)] 下面的代码示例显示了使用服务器和客户端的远程对象：The following code example shows the remote object used by the server and the client: [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CPP/common.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CS/common.cs#20)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，仅激活客户端信道，不激活服务器信道。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, activating only a client channel, and not a server channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认构造函数初始化为其默认值的所有字段。The default constructor initializes all fields to their default values. 如果使用默认构造函数，则通道仅用作客户端通道，并不在任何端口上侦听。If the default constructor is used, the channel functions only as a client channel, and does not listen on any ports. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CPP/client.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CS/client.cs#11)]

param.name: port
param.span: 服务器信道侦听的端口。

span.span: The port on which the server channel listens.

summary.span: 使用侦听指定端口的服务器信道初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a server channel that listens on the specified port.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要请求远程处理系统选择代表你的开放端口，指定端口 0 （零）。To request that the remoting system choose an open port on your behalf, specify port 0 (zero). 这将创建实例以动态分配的端口上侦听请求。This will create a instance to listen for requests on the dynamically assigned port. 这通常是在客户端，确保正在侦听的回叫方法。This is typically done on the client to make sure that a is listening for callback methods. 如果将 0 传递给构造函数实例化，以使用了可用端口。If 0 is passed to the constructor the is instantiated to use a free port. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example demonstrates using this method. 若要请求动态分配可用端口，设置`port`参数为零。To request that an available port be dynamically assigned, set the `port` parameter to zero. [!code-cpp[RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation/CPP/server.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation/CS/server.cs#2)] [!code-vb[RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation/VB/server.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider clientSinkProvider, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider serverSinkProvider) cil managed
Public Sub New (properties As IDictionary, clientSinkProvider As IClientChannelSinkProvider, serverSinkProvider As IServerChannelSinkProvider)

param.name: properties
param.span: 一个 集合，它为客户端和服务器信道要使用的配置属性指定值。

span.span: A collection that specifies values for configuration properties to be used by the client and server channels.

param.name: clientSinkProvider
param.span: 客户端信道要使用的 实现。

span.span: The implementation to be used by the client channel.

param.name: serverSinkProvider
param.span: 服务器信道要使用的 实现。

span.span: The implementation to be used by the server channel.

summary.span: 使用指定的配置属性和接收器初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified configuration properties and sinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关通道配置属性的详细信息，请参阅[通道和格式化程序配置属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe). > [!NOTE] > 如果服务器计算机运行 Windows 95/98/Me，则服务器不能被指定为安全。If the server computer is running Windows 95/98/Me, the server cannot be specified as secure. 信道接收器提供允许访问基础消息流经该通道，以及传输机制用于将消息发送到远程对象的流的插件点。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 信道接收器也要负责在客户端和服务器之间传输消息。Channel sinks are also responsible for transporting messages between the client and the server. 信道接收器链中链接在一起，所有信道消息流过此接收器链之前最终序列化和传输消息。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain, and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is finally serialized and transported. 如果不需要接收器功能，设置`clientSinkProvider`并`serverSinkProvider`参数`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `clientSinkProvider` and `serverSinkProvider` parameters to `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel2/CPP/server.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel2/CS/server.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个已注册的信道都有唯一的名称。Every registered channel has a unique name. 该名称用于在调用时检索特定的信道。The name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling . 若要设置属性中，为"name"的值编制索引传递给在字典中的属性分配构造函数。To set the property, assign the value to the "name" indexed property in the dictionary passed to the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example shows how to use this property. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CPP/server.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CS/server.cs#3)]

param.name: objectURI
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含新信道消息接收器的 URI，该信道消息接收器将消息传送到指定 URL 或信道数据对象。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a URI of the new channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 返回将消息传送到指定 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器。

span.span: Returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

returns.span: 将消息传递给指定 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器。

span.span: A channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回的信道消息接收器将消息传送到任一指定的 URL 或信道数据对象。The method returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to either the specified URL or channel data object. 如果`uri`参数是`null`，`remoteChannelData`用作接收器的目标。If the `uri` parameter is `null`, `remoteChannelData` is used as a target for the sink. 要么`url`或`remoteChannelData`参数可以是`null`，但不可同时使用两者。Either the `url` or `remoteChannelData` parameters can be `null`, but not both. 信道接收器提供允许访问基础消息流经该通道，以及传输机制用于将消息发送到远程对象的流的插件点。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 信道接收器链中的链接在一起`ChannelSinkProviders`之前，所有信道消息流经此接收器链最终序列化和传输消息。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain of `ChannelSinkProviders` and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is finally serialized and transported. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CPP/client.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpChannel/CS/client.cs#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StartListening(object data) cil managed
abstract member StartListening : obj -> unit override this.StartListening : obj -> unit

span.span: Optional initialization information.

summary.span: 指示当前信道开始侦听请求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to start listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不需要调用此方法以开始侦听新初始化通道。It is not necessary to call this method to begin listening on a newly initialized channel. 使用此方法可重新开始侦听通道后调用方法。Use this method to restart listening on a channel after the method has been called. 如果您的通道使用动态分配的端口号，则重新开始侦听时，可能会更改端口号。If your channel uses a dynamically assigned port number, your port number might change when you restart listening. `data`参数可用于将特定的初始化状态传递到通道。The `data` parameter can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果您不想要将某一特定状态传递到通道，设置`data`到`null`。If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, set `data` to `null`.

abstract member StopListening : obj -> unit override this.StopListening : obj -> unit

param.name: data
param.span: 该信道的可选状态信息。

span.span: Optional state information for the channel.

summary.span: 指示当前信道停止侦听请求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to stop listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可停止侦听通道上。Use this method to stop listening on a channel. 若要重新开始侦听，请使用方法。To restart listening, use the method. 如果您的通道使用动态分配的端口号，则重新开始侦听时，可能会更改端口号。If your channel uses a dynamically assigned port number, your port number might change when you restart listening. `data`参数可用于将特定的初始化状态传递到通道。The `data` parameter can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果您不想要将某一特定状态传递到通道，设置`data`到`null`。If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, set `data` to `null`.
